About Me

Hi! I'm Aron, a second-year student at UCLA studying computational math.

My interests include 3D graphics and game design. Right now, I am focusing on learning Unity to make games. I have also been dabbling in Javascript, specifically Three.js to make 3D web graphics.

Outside of programming, I enjoy rock climbing and playing the ukulele.
